product_name: Wallaroo Petite Breton Sun Hat - Girls'
long_description: The sophisticated Wallaroo Petite Breton Hat for girls features a contrasting poly-ribbon braid for a punch of color, set off with a natural wooden-beaded leather tie. Wide brim offers excellent sun protection and style; crushable design bounces back no matter what bag or purse it gets packed into. The Wallaroo Petite Breton Hat features an adjustable 55cm crown that will fit most 7-14 year olds. UPF 50+ sun protection; 3.5 in. brim; 100% polyester; hand wash cold.
short_description: The sophisticated Wallaroo Petite Breton Hat for girls features a contrasting poly-ribbon braid for a punch of color, set off with a natural wooden-beaded leather tie.
